name: Drift Station Open World drive
description:
From the creators of the awesome drifting game ( Drift Factory )
a new legendary drift game comes

Drift Station : Features a list of the most realistic cars to make you feel like you are in the real world , Customize your racing car as you like , explore the huge open world , and enjoy realistic driving in cities and on highways .

REAL CAR DRIFTING GAME :
- Huge collection of Realistic Racing Cars
- Every car has a detailed realistic interior
- High graphics detailed world
- Amazing and realistic drift physics
- A large open world without limits
- Customize the car drift tuning as you Like
- Customize your racing car completely (color, stickers, spoiler, wheels, engine, brakes ........ etc.)
- Optimized for all devices

Get ready for the never-before-seen racing game experience
install it and upgrade your racing car to rip up the asphalt with your tires

NOTE: this is a free to play game and doesn’t require an internet connection after installation
